ru.ifmo.ctddev.osipov.implementor

Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.osipov.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler

    public class Implementor
extends Object
implements JarImpler
    Provides implementation for interface and JarImpler.

    • Method Detail

      • implement

        public void implement(Class<?> token,
                      Path root)
               throws ImplerException
        Produces code implementing for java class or interface specified by provided token.

        Generated class full name have to contains of type token full name and suffix Impl Generated code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct filename i.e. the implementation of the interface List should be placed into $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for
        root - root directory
        Throws:
        ImplerException - ImplerException when implementation can't be generated

      • printPackage

        private void printPackage(Writer printWriter,
                          Class cls)
                   throws IOException
        Receives and prints package of implementing class by using Writer into the required file.
        Parameters:
        printWriter - output destination.
        cls - class token
        Throws:
        IOException - error during writing into required file.

                         PrintWriter printWriter)
                  throws IOException
        Receives and prints current method of implementing class by using Writer into the required file.
        Parameters:

        printWriter - output destination.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during printing method.

      • printHeader

        private void printHeader(Writer printWriter,
                         String executableName,
                         Executable executable)
                  throws IOException
        Prints header of Executable by using Writer.

        Prints return type of executable if it is a method, name of executable, parameters it takes (with fully qualified type names) and exceptions it can throw.

        Parameters:
        printWriter - output destination.
        executableName - name of executable to be printed.
        executable - executable whose header is printed.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during printing header.

      • printArguments

        private void printArguments(Writer printWriter,
                            Executable executable)
                     throws IOException
        Prints arguments of Executable by using Writer.
        Parameters:
        printWriter - output destination.
        executable - executable whose header is printed.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during printing arguments.

      • printExceptions

        private void printExceptions(Writer printWriter,
                             Executable executable)
                      throws IOException
        Prints exceptions of Executable by using Writer.
        Parameters:
        printWriter - output destination.
        executable - executable whose header is printed.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during printing arguments.

      • getReturnedValueByDefaultMethod

        private String getReturnedValueByDefaultMethod(Class<?> type)
        Generates the string representing the default value of class with given token.

        It is null for non-primitive types, false for boolean, empty string for void and 0 for other.

        Parameters:
        type - type token to get default value for.
        Returns:
        String with default value.

      • getFileName

        private static Path getFileName(Class<?> cls,
                                Path path)
                         throws IOException
        Builds a path, where implementation of clazz should be placed. Implementation file has suffix Impl.java and is placed in $root/<package-dirs>/ folder.

        All directories are creating automatically.

        Parameters:
        cls - Token to resolve implementation path for.
        path - Directory to be treated as packages root.
        Returns:
        Path to file with implementation.
        Throws:
        IOException - If creation of directories has failed.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Entry point of the program for command line arguments.

        Usage:

        • java -jar Implementor.jar -jar class-to-implement path-to-jar
        • java -jar Implementor.jar class-to-implement path-to-class
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments.

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar(Class<?> aClass,
                         Path path)
                  throws ImplerException
        Creates .jar file of implemented class or interface aClass by using implement(Class, Path) new file have to be printed into the correct subdirectory according to path

        Generated class full name should be same as full name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        aClass - type token to create implementation for.
        path - target .jar file.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - ImplerException when implementation cannot be generated.

      • getClassPathJar

        public static Path getClassPathJar(Path execFileName)
        Generates a path to compiled .class file by path to .java file by replacing execFileName .java extension to .class extension.
        Parameters:
        execFileName - A path to .java file.
        Returns:
        A path to corresponding .class file in same folder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If execFileName doesn't have .java extension.

      • printJar

        public static void printJar(Path jarPath,
                            Path fileToPrint)
                     throws IOException
        Creates jar archive at jarPath with given jarPath and copies existing fileToPrint to it.

        If archive already exists, overwrites it.

        Creates MANIFEST.MF file too with the MAIN_CLASS named fileToPrint and MANIFEST_VERSION: 1.0

        Parameters:
        jarPath - The path for jar archive. Directories on path should exist.
        fileToPrint - The name of file to be copied into archive. Should exist.
        Throws:
        IOException - If I/O error occurred, e.g. if fileName of jarDirectory don't exist, or if unexpected error happened during creating or writing to archive.

      • compileClass

        public static void compileClass(Path packageRoot,
                                Path codeFileName)
                         throws ImplerException
        Compiles given file.

        Using default java compiler, provided by ToolProvider.getSystemJavaCompiler(), compiles the file located at codeFileName, using packageRoot as a classpath.

        Parameters:
        packageRoot - Path to a package root, will be used as a classpath.
        codeFileName - Path to a file. Should already contain path to the package.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - ImplerException when default compiler is unavailable or compilation error has occurred (compiler returned non-zero exit code).
